title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in dynamic text items is inconsistent with the format displayed in data/text items.
OB: The observed behavior is that datetime values retrieved from a table are displayed in one format in dynamic text items and a different format in data/text items.
EB: The expected behavior is that datetime values should be displayed in a consistent format across both dynamic text items and data/text items.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Insert a dynamic text item with a datetime value.
2. Insert a data/text item with the same datetime value from the table.
